effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to imbue you with Sanctified Swiftness, granting 74 Speed stacking up to 10 times.

After receiving 10 stacks, release the stored energy dealing 518,167 Holy damage split between all enemies within 10 yards.
Use: Gain 4,549 Parry and 3,234 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 79,763 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,855 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 269,614 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,153 Strength and absorbing 1.3 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 500,997 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 120,294 Shadow damage.

transmog.display_string:

Edge of the First Blade
